metadata.title: CVE-2015-7560

platform: SUSE Linux Enterprise Server for Raspberry Pi 12 SP2
SUSE Linux Enterprise Server for SAP Applications 12
SUSE Linux Enterprise Server for SAP Applications 12 SP1
SUSE Linux Enterprise Server for SAP Applications 12 SP3

metadata.description: The SMB1 implementation in smbd in Samba 3.x and 4.x before 4.1.23, 4.2.x before 4.2.9, 4.3.x before 4.3.6, and 4.4.x before 4.4.0rc4 allows remote authenticated users to modify arbitrary ACLs by using a UNIX SMB1 call to create a symlink, and then using a non-UNIX SMB1 call to write to the ACL content.

criterions.comment: SUSE Linux Enterprise Server for SAP Applications 12 SP3 is installed
SUSE Linux Enterprise Server 12 is installed

SUSE Linux Enterprise Server 12 SP1 is installed
